short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The MSU Unlinked extension unintrusively shows the broken and dead links on Montana State University's numerous websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of the MSU Unlinked extension is to unintrusively show the broken and dead links on Montana State University's numerous websites. It dynamically grays out and applies strikethrough to any dead or broken links, and allows the user to mark undiscovered ones as well. The extension comes bundled with pre-discovered links, however they can be removed from the options menu.
